name: Grant access to a user to a single serverless SQL pool database

content.query:
--1.a Create LOGIN for an Azure AD account.To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.

CREATE USER [alias@domain.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;


--1.b Create a Login for a SQL authuser. To create a login, you must be connected to the master database.
CREATE LOGIN <login_alias> WITH PASSWORD = 'enter_your_password';
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN <login_alias>

--2.a Create USER for the Azure AD account

use yourdb -- Use your DB name
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN [alias@domain.com]

--2.b Create USER for the SQL Auth account
use yourdb -- Use your DB name
CREATE USER <user_alias> FROM LOGIN <login_alias>

--3.Add USER to members of the specified role

use yourdb -- Use your DB name
go
alter role db_owner Add MEMBER <user_alias> -- Type user alias from step 2
